protocol.name: P-AFFY-2
protocol.text: Labeling of samples was carried out according to the manufacturer’s standard protocol
Equal amounts of RNA from triplicate samples were pooled.

text: Following treatment, Arabidopsis plants were immediately frozen in liquid nitrogen, and stored at -80C. Total RNA was isolated from frozen Arabidopsis using RNeasy Plant Mini Kit (Qiagen GmbH, Hilden, Germany) according to the manufacturerﾒs instructions.

Pro35S:ARR22:HA (line#11-7) transgenic plants were grown for 5 days under long-day conditions (16h light/8h dark) on 0.5x Murashige Skoog (MS) medium containing vitamins, 1.5% sucrose, 2.5 mM Mes, pH 5.7, and 0.8% agar., and then transferred to 0.5x MS agar plates containing 10 uM DEX, and grown for additional 5 days.
(Parameters: time unit = seconds, temperature unit = C)

Pro35S:ARR22:HA (line#11-7) transgenic plants were grown for 5 days under long-day conditions (16h light/8h dark) on 0.5x Murashige Skoog (MS) medium containing vitamins, 1.5% sucrose, 2.5 mM Mes, pH 5.7, and 0.8% agar, and then transferred to 0.5x MS agar plates and grown for additional 5 days.
(Parameters: time unit = seconds, temperature unit = C)
